actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to codify an Executive order preparing the United States for the impacts of climate change, and for other purposes.
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text: This bill provides statutory authority for Executive Order 13653, which set forth strategies to enhance climate preparedness and resilience. It also established an interagency Council on Climate Preparedness and Resilience as well a State, Local, and Tribal Leaders Task Force on Climate Preparedness and Resilience.

titles.title: A bill to codify an Executive order preparing the United States for the impacts of climate change, and for other purposes.
A bill to codify an Executive order preparing the United States for the impacts of climate change, and for other purposes.
